entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:19 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 01:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: N 20 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of freezing drizzle after midnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain except rain along parts of the coast late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
